linkart.midnightconfig.title: Linkart
linkart.midnightconfig.pathfindingDistan: This is the maximum distance a cart will follow its parent for. Carts will break apart if their distance is greater.
linkart.midnightconfig.velocityMultiplie: Multiplies the speed of the followers.
linkart.midnightconfig.collisionDepth.to: Controls the number of carts a linked cart will ignore collisions with. This works in both directions, so a cart in the middle will ignore <=16 collisions.
linkart.midnightconfig.chunkloading.tool: Allow linked carts to load chunks as they move.
linkart.midnightconfig.chunkloadingRadiu: The radius of chunks that a given cart can load.
